theScene: A small confession booth is located at the eastern side of the church.
You decide to head into the confession booth.
It doesn't take long until you hear the sound of someone approaching the other side of the boothand then the opening of it's door.
The familiar voice of Lillian rings into your ears, dampened by the divider between the two booths.
Oh poor lost child of Venereae, confess your sins and the holy mother shall cleanse you of your wrongdoings.
You don't think you are in need of a confession right now.
